html:

Quotation Number: {{ doc.name }}
Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("transaction_date") }}
Terms: {{ doc.get_formatted("payment_terms_template" or "") }}
Expiration Date: {{ doc.get_formatted("valid_till") }}

{{doc.company}}
{{ doc.company_address_display }}

To:

{{doc.customer_name}}
{% if doc.customer_address %} {{ doc.address_display }} {% endif %}

{% set customer_pin = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "tax_id") %} Buyer PIN N°: {{ customer_pin }}

{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Qty Item Code Product / License Description Unit Price(USD) Line Total(USD)
{{ row.qty }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
Subtotal {{ doc.get_formatted("total") }}
Total {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{% if doc.tc_name %} {% endif %}
{{ doc.tc_name }}
{{ doc.terms }} {% if doc.docstatus == 1 %}
{% endif %}

Thank you for your business!
name: SampleQuoteFormat
